name: Iris Apfel
description:
What is going on with this website? What are all these recent profiles of fashion designers? What happened to the old days when our only entry to the world of fashion was to profile models?

Well, how about a model AND a fashion designer? Iris Apfel, who just passed away at the age of 102.

Yes, Apfel was a fashion designer (also an interior designer; she worked for nine US presidents). She was also a model, becoming one at past the age of 90. "More is more and less is a bore" was the motto of the "geriatric starlet". She had a global modeling contract with the famed agency IMG into her 100s.

So, budding Jewish models, there is life after youth. Follow in the footsteps of Iris, and you just might get profiled on JONJ one day!

You might not even have to die first...
